thread.section_title: Federal Judge Issues Emergency Stay On Trump Immigrant Ban – CBS San Francisco
thread.title: Federal Judge Issues Emergency Stay On Trump Immigrant Ban
thread.title_full: Federal Judge Issues Emergency Stay On Trump Immigrant Ban

author: jamapro
title: Federal Judge Issues Emergency Stay On Trump Immigrant Ban
text:
SAN FRANCISCO (CBS SF) — A federal judge in Brooklyn issued an emergency stay on President Trump’s executive order banning immigrants from 7 Muslim countries.
The American Civil Liberties Union filed a petition on behalf of 2 Iraqi men detained at John F. Kennedy Airport in New York.
The 90-day ban applied to travelers from Iran, Iraq, Syria, Yemen, Sudan, Somalia and Libya and includes American residents holding green cards. The move sparked protests at JFK, SFO and airports across the country. Many feared the list could get longer.
On Saturday dozens of immigrants were detained and removed from planes en route to the U.S., and travelers are being detained upon arrival, as well.
